name: Bandia Brookina
description: Hey guys! This is a game that I am making for my wife on my off time from work. She really likes platformers and I can't think of a better way to show her how much she means to me. So I am using this place to let my friends beta test the game for me as I create it. I only have the first 4 levels and they are currently on repeat. Next update will be esc taking you to menu, and clicking on boss pictures will take you to their individual lvls. I am not a computer engineer or programmer so some bugs I cant' fix. Feel free to leave me with any ideas or game breaking bugs. enjoy!
